title: Peterborough: Cost of living dominates in Labour local election target
description: Partygate is not the main things on voters' minds in Peterborough, ahead of Thursday's local election.

title: Shanghai lockdown: The hard life of a homeless deliveryman
description: Many riders face a lack of shelter and safety while delivering supplies in a locked down city.

title: Mariupol civilians taken to both sides' territory
description: Trapped for months, dozens of people have now been taken to both Ukraine-held and Russia-held territory.

title: Unravelling Australia's complex jobs puzzle
description: An uneven recovery from the pandemic leaves graduates struggling to get on the career ladder.

title: 'The Down Syndrome Act means so much to me'
description: Families have been working together to bring about change for people with Down's syndrome.

title: General Belgrano: The opera singer who survived the sinking of the Argentine cruiser
description: In May 1982, the Argentine cruiser the General Belgrano was sunk by British torpedoes during the war over the Falkland or Malvinas Islands.

title: Dutch boy, 4, takes mother's car for a joyride
description: Despite crashing into two parked cars, no one was hurt in the youngster's early morning escapade.

title: Princess Charlotte's seventh birthday marked with photos
description: They have been taken by the Duchess of Cambridge and released ahead of Charlotte's seventh birthday.

title: Ukraine round-up: Mariupol evacuation and pilot legend
description: The Red Cross and UN say they are evacuating civilians from Mariupol, and Ukraine busts a war myth.

title: World Snooker Championship: Ronnie O'Sullivan argues with referee during final
description: Watch Ronnie O'Sullivan argue with the referee during the World Snooker Championship final, with the official reprimanding him for making what he believed to be an obscene gesture.

title: New 3D female anatomy model used to better treat women
description: A new 3D female anatomy model is being used to teach first year medical students.

title: Typewriter artist James Cook 'blown away' by Tom Hanks response
description: Artist James Cook uses the characters of a typewriter to create pictures.

title: In Pictures: Beltane fire festival returns to Edinburgh
description: Hundreds gathered at the National Monument of Scotland for the celebration from Celtic folklore.

title: Westminster reform: Lindsay Hoyle and Andrea Leadsom call for urgent changes
description: Parliament needs an overhaul, politicians say, after MP Neil Parish quits over watching porn in the Commons.

title: HRT shortage UK: Davina McCall says crisis is ridiculous
description: Davina McCall says she was "a mush" when the menopause hit, as she calls for shortages to be sorted out.

title: How Ukraine's 'Ghost of Kyiv' legendary pilot was born
description: The "Ghost of Kyiv" story about a heroic pilot downing many Russian planes turns out to be a legend.

title: Dad plays with seven sons in final Heaton Moor rugby match
description: Mike Ireland and his seven sons made up a full scrum for Heaton Moor RUFC on Saturday.

title: Katie Taylor and Amanda Serrano react after 'unbelievable' bout at sold-out Madison Square Garden
description: Katie Taylor says her split-decision points win over Amanda Serrano at a sold-out Madison Square Garden, New York, is the "best moment" of her career, and both fighters confirm their desire for a rematch in Ireland.

title: Tributes paid after death of country music star Naomi Judd, 76
description: Ms Judd, 76, had a string of hits and awards with her daughter in the country music duo, The Judds.

title: Ukraine war: British ambassador 'comfortable' to be back in Kyiv
description: British ambassador Melinda Simmons says she is comfortable to return to the capital despite the risks.

title: Katie Taylor v Amanda Serrano: Can Taylor pull off one more miracle?
description: Katie Taylor has already changed a country's view on women's boxing. After reaching the pinnacle of her career, what chance of a historic Irish homecoming?

title: Neil Parish tractor search: Can see how it led to porn says MP's friend
description: A friend of disgraced MP Neil Parish says the tractor's name was "a play on words", as he supports him.

title: Bristol Parkway celebrates 50th anniversary
description: When Bristol Parkway was built 50 years ago it was described as a car park with a railway station.

title: Nancy Pelosi pledges US support until 'fight is done'
description: The speaker of the US House of Representatives says Ukraine is fighting for everyone's freedom.

title: The Papers: 'End Commons debauchery' and Tory female MP pledge
description: The fallout from an MP's resignation over watching pornography in Parliament dominates the Sunday papers.

title: Katie Taylor v Amanda Serrano: Taylor retains lightweight world titles with split-decision points win
description: Katie Taylor edges Amanda Serrano on points with a split-decision win in an instant classic at Madison Square Garden in New York.

title: Ukraine war: Resistance to Russian rouble in Kherson
description: Russian forces say the currency will be used there from Sunday. But many residents have other ideas.
